channel.title: Where to stay on Vida Leblon

item.title: Vida Leblon Humberto
item.description: About this space Upscale, brand new condo in the heart of Leblon. Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and washer/dryer, a cute balcony, and steps from the beach, the subway and the best restaurants and shopping in Rio. Every room has AC, ceiling fan and TV. Living room with open kitchen, bar seating couch and 50" TV, with cute balcony and hammock. Kitchen with dishwasher, washer/dryer, small laundry space, and full size refrigerator.
